trans-unit.source: Represents a control consisting of a movable bar that divides a container's display area into two resizable panels.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controlo constituída por uma barra de movable divide a área de apresentação de um contentor em dois painéis redimensionáveis.

trans-unit.source: You can add controls to the two resizable panels, and you can add other SplitContainer controls to existing SplitContainer panels to create many resizable display areas.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar controlos dois painéis redimensionáveis e pode adicionar outros controlos de SplitContainer painéis de SplitContainer existentes para criar várias áreas de apresentação redimensionável.

trans-unit.source: Use the SplitContainer control to divide the display area of a container (such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>) and allow the user to resize controls that are added to the SplitContainer panels.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o controlo de SplitContainer para dividir a área de apresentação de um contentor (tal como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>) e permitir que o utilizador redimensionar controlos que são adicionados aos painéis SplitContainer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: When the user passes the mouse pointer over the splitter, the cursor changes to indicate that the controls inside the SplitContainer control can be resized.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador passa o ponteiro do rato sobre o divisor, o cursor é alterado para indicar que os controlos no interior do controlo de SplitContainer podem ser redimensionados.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Previous versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] only support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Versões anterior a [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] só suportam o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>

trans-unit.source: SplitContainer also eases control placement at design time.
trans-unit.target: SplitContainer também facilita a colocação de controlo no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: For example, to create a window similar to Windows Explorer, add a SplitContainer control to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property to `DockStyle.Fill`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para criar uma janela semelhante ao Explorador do Windows, adicionar um controlo SplitContainer um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>e definir o respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>propriedade `DockStyle.Fill`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: Add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property to `DockStyle.Fill`.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlar para as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>propriedade para `DockStyle.Fill`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: To complete the layout, add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property to `DockStyle.Fill` to have the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> occupy the remaining space on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Para concluir o esquema, adicionar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlar e definir o respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>propriedade `DockStyle.Fill` ter <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>ocupam o espaço restante em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: At run time, the user can then resize the width of both controls using the splitter.
trans-unit.target: Em tempo de execução, o utilizador, em seguida, pode redimensionar a largura de ambos os controlos utilizando o divisor.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A> property to specify that a control should not be resized along with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> or other container.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A>propriedade para especificar que um controlo não deverá ser redimensionado juntamente com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>ou outro contentor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A> to specify where the splitter starts on your form.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A>para especificar onde o divisor é iniciado o formulário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterIncrement%2A> to specify how many pixels the splitter moves at a time.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterIncrement%2A>para especificar o número de pixels do divisor se move cada vez.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterIncrement%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterIncrement%2A> is one pixel.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterIncrement%2A>é um pixel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterIncrement%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A> to specify how close the splitter bar can be moved to the outside edge of a SplitContainer panel.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A>para especificar como fechar a barra de divisor pode ser movida para o limite fora de um painel SplitContainer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default minimum size of a panel is 25 pixels.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho mínimo predefinido de um painel é 25 pixéis.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> property to specify horizontal orientation.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>propriedade para especificar orientação horizontal.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default orientation of the SplitContainer is vertical.
trans-unit.target: A orientação de predefinição do SplitContainer é vertical.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BorderStyle%2A> property to specify the border style of the SplitContainer and coordinate its border style with the border style of controls that you add to the SplitContainer.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BorderStyle%2A>propriedade para especificar o estilo do limite de SplitContainer e coordenar o estilo de limite com o estilo do limite dos controlos que adiciona ao SplitContainer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value indicating whether scroll bars automatically appear if controls are placed outside the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"></xref> client area.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém ou define um valor que indica se as barras de deslocamento aparecem automaticamente se os controlos são colocados fora do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"> </xref> área cliente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the auto-scroll margin.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho da margem de deslocamento automático.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é relevante para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é relevante para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: The auto-scroll margin is the distance between any child controls and the edges of the scrollable parent control.
trans-unit.target: A margem de deslocamento automático é a distância entre todos os controlos subordinados e os limites do controlo principal deslocável.

trans-unit.source: The AutoScrollMargin size is added to the size of any child controls contained in the scrollable control to determine if scroll bars are needed.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho de AutoScrollMargin é adicionado para o tamanho de todos os controlos subordinados contidos no controlo deslocável para determinar se são necessárias as barras de deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: The AutoScrollMargin property is evaluated when the parent scrollable control is resized or the individual child controls are brought into view, and is used to determine if scroll bars must be displayed.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AutoScrollMargin é avaliada quando o controlo de deslocável principal foi redimensionado ou os controlos subordinados individuais são colocados em vista e é utilizada para determinar se devem apresentar barras de deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: Docked controls are excluded from the calculations that determine if scroll bars must be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Acrescentar controlos ancorados são excluídos dos cálculos que determinam se as barras de deslocamento devem ser apresentadas.

trans-unit.source: If the distance from the edge of a child control to the parent scrollable control is less than the value assigned to the AutoScrollMargin property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoScroll%2A> property is set to `true`, the appropriate scroll bar is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se a distância do limite de um controlo subordinado para o controlo de deslocável principal é inferior ao valor atribuído à propriedade AutoScrollMargin e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoScroll%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`, é apresentada a barra de deslocamento adequado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é relevante para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> value that represents the height and width, in pixels, of the auto-scroll margin.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> valor que representa a altura e largura, em pixels, da margem da deslocamento automático.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"></xref> is automatically resized to display its entire contents.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"> </xref> é automaticamente redimensionada para apresentar todo o conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é relevante para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: The contents of a control may change for many reasons; including display data changes; addition of child controls; layout and padding changes; or system font, language, or resolution changes.
trans-unit.target: Pode alterar o conteúdo de um controlo por muitos motivos; alterações de dados de apresentação, incluindo; adição de controlos subordinados; preenchimento alterações; e de esquema ou alterações do tipo de letra, idioma ou de resolução do sistema.

trans-unit.source: If the AutoSize property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> will resize automatically to encompass its contents, although it will never be resized to be smaller than its original <xref:System.Drawing.Size>.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade AutoSize é definida como `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>será redimensionada automaticamente para abranger o respetivo conteúdo, embora nunca irá ser redimensionada para ser inferior a respetiva original <xref:System.Drawing.Size>.</xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>

trans-unit.source: This operation will maintain the control’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Padding%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esta operação irá manter o controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Padding%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Padding%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"> </xref> é automaticamente redimensionado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: - Use the BackgroundImage property to place a graphic image onto a control.
trans-unit.target: -Utilize a propriedade BackgroundImage para colocar uma imagem do gráfico num controlo.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Images with translucent or transparent colors are not supported by Windows Forms controls as background images.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Imagens com cores translucent ou transparentes não são suportadas pelos controlos de Windows Forms de imagens em segundo plano.

trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define qual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"> </xref> limites estão anexados aos limites do contentor.

trans-unit.source: You can dock a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> to any edge of its container, or you can dock a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> to all edges of the container so that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> entirely fills the container.
trans-unit.target: Pode ancorar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>para qualquer limite do respectivo contentor, ou pode ancorar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>para todas as extremidades do contentor para que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>inteiramente preenche o contentor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>

trans-unit.source: For example, set this property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle?displayProperty=fullName> to attach the left edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> to the left edge of its container.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, defina esta propriedade como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle?displayProperty=fullName>para anexar o limite esquerdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>para o limite esquerdo do respectivo contentor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Controls are docked in z-order.
trans-unit.target: Controlos estiverem ancorados na ordem z.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The z-order corresponds to the depth dimension of the screen, and the x-order and y-order corresponds to the horizontal and vertical dimensions, respectively.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Corresponde a ordem z para a dimensão de profundidade do ecrã e a ordem de x e y ordem corresponde a dimensões horizontais e verticais, respetivamente.

trans-unit.source: Z-order defines which object appears in front of which, in cases where controls or windows can overlap or occupy the same space on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Ordem Z define o objeto é apresentado à frente que, em casos onde controlos windows pode sobrepor-se ou ocupam mesmo espaço no ecrã.

trans-unit.source: A control or window at the top of the z-order appears on top of all other controls or windows and is referenced by an index of 0 in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um controlo ou janela na parte superior a ordem z aparece em cima de todos os outros controlos ou o windows e é referenciada por um índice 0 no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Controls%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: A control or window at the bottom of the z-order appears underneath all other controls or windows and is referenced by an index of `(Controls.Count-1)` in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um controlo ou janela na parte inferior a ordem z aparece por baixo de todos os outros controlos ou o windows e é referenciada por um índice de `(Controls.Count-1)` no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Controls%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about anchoring and docking controls, see [How to: Create a Multipane User Interface with Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre controlos anchoring e ancoragem, consulte [como: criar uma Interface de utilizador Multipane com o Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Signals the object that initialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: Sinalizar o objeto que inicialização está concluída.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"></xref> panel remains the same size when the container is resized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define qual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"> </xref> painel permanece o mesmo tamanho quando o contentor foi redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> panel stays the same size when a user resizes the container.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para especificar que <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>painel permanece o mesmo tamanho quando um utilizador redimensionar o contentor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FixedPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FixedPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FixedPanel"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído não é um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FixedPanel"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the splitter is fixed or movable.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o divisor é fixo ou movable.

trans-unit.source: Use the IsSplitterFixed property to enable or disable splitter movement.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de IsSplitterFixed para ativar ou desativar o movimento do divisor.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might programmatically set IsSplitterFixed to `true` when refreshing the display, when some other control has the focus, or when an event is occurring for which the display areas divided by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> must remain constant, and set IsSplitterFixed to `false` when those circumstances do not apply.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, através de programação poderá definir IsSplitterFixed `true` quando atualizar a apresentação, quando algum outro controlo tem o foco, ou quando um evento está a ocorrer para o qual as áreas de ecrã dividido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>têm de permanecer IsSplitterFixed constante e definido para `false` quando esses circunstâncias não se aplicam.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the splitter is fixed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o divisor é corrigido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: By default, the OnKeyDown event handler allows the user to move the splitter down when the DOWN arrow key is pressed.

trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos OnKeyDown também desenha a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A>para mostrar a posição atual do divisor enquanto esta está a mover.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A>

trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade Panel1 para configurar o painel esquerdo de uma vertical <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>ou o painel superior de um horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify the minimum size of the panel by changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A> property, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A> property to `Panel1` so that the panel remains the same size when the container is resized, or you can get or set the panel's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode especificar o tamanho mínimo do painel alterando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A>definir a propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A>propriedade `Panel1` para que o painel permanece o mesmo tamanho quando é redimensionado o contentor, ou pode obter ou definir o painel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> property is `Horizontal`, Panel1MinSize returns the minimum distance in pixels of the splitter from the top edge of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog box key.
trans-unit.target: Os processos de uma chave de caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog box key characters, such as TAB, LEFT ARROW, RIGHT ARROW, UP ARROW, and DOWN ARROW.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado durante a mensagem pré-processamentos para processar o carateres, da chave de caixa de diálogo como SEPARADOR, seta para a esquerda, direita seta, seta para cima e seta para baixo.

trans-unit.source: Keys that include the ALT or CONTROL modifiers are not handled.
trans-unit.target: As chaves que incluem os modificadores ALT ou controlo não são processadas.

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method indicates that the control is not processing the key.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado apenas se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método indica que o controlo não está a processar a chave.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> simply sends the character to the parent's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>simplesmente envia o caráter para o elemento principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método ou devolve `false` se o controlo não tem um principal.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=fullName> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog box keys.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=fullName>classe substitui este método para efetuar o processamento real das chaves de caixa de diálogo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The run time calls this method only when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: O tempo de execução chama este método apenas quando o controlo está alojado numa aplicação de Windows Forms ou como um controlo ActiveX.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores que representa a chave para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave foi processada pelo controlo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Selects the next available control and makes it the active control.
trans-unit.target: Seleciona o controlo seguinte disponível e torna o controlo activo.

trans-unit.source: ProcessTabKey controls the tab focus order in the following manner: - From the first control outside the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> to the first control on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ProcessTabKey controla a ordem de foco de separador da seguinte forma: - a partir do primeiro controlo fora <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>para o primeiro controlo da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>

trans-unit.source: - All controls on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the splitter, in pixels, from the left or top edge of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a localização do divisor, em pixels, a partir da extremidade esquerda ou superior do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the SplitterDistance property to determine or specify the distance in pixels of the splitter from the left or top edge of the container.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de SplitterDistance para determinar ou especificar a distância, em pixels do divisor da extremidade esquerda ou superior do contentor.

trans-unit.source: You can both specify an initial distance and change the distance at design time or run time.
trans-unit.target: Pode de especificar uma distância inicial e alterar a distância no momento da conceção ou tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> is `Horizontal`, SplitterDistance is calculated in pixels from the top edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>é `Horizontal`, SplitterDistance é calculado em pixéis do limite superior da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> is `Vertical`, SplitterDistance is calculated in pixels from the left edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>é `Vertical`, SplitterDistance é calculado em pixéis do limite esquerdo da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName> representing the location of the splitter, in pixels, from the left or top edge of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName> que representa a localização do divisor, em pixels, a partir da extremidade esquerda ou superior do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 50 pixels.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é 50 pixéis.

trans-unit.source: The value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: O valor é menor do que zero.

trans-unit.source: The value is incompatible with the orientation.
trans-unit.target: O valor é incompatível com a orientação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value representing the increment of splitter movement in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que representa o incremento de movimento do divisor em pixéis.

trans-unit.source: Use the SplitterIncrement property to create a snapping splitter that moves in larger increments than one pixel.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de SplitterIncrement para criar um divisor de ajuste que se move em incrementos de maior do que um pixel.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName> representing the increment of splitter movement in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName> que representa o incremento de movimento do divisor em pixéis.

trans-unit.source: The default value is one pixel.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é de um pixel.

trans-unit.source: The value is less than one.
trans-unit.target: O valor é menor que um.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the splitter control is moved.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controlo do divisor é movido.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the splitter control is in the process of moving.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controlo do divisor está em vias de mudar.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the user moves the splitter control.
trans-unit.target: Este evento ocorre apenas quando o utilizador move o controlo do divisor.

trans-unit.source: It does not occur when you change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A> property value programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Não ocorre quando altera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A>valor de propriedade através de programação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the splitter relative to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho e a localização do divisor relativa a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use SplitterRectangle to get the width and height of the splitter relative to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize SplitterRectangle para obter a largura e altura do divisor relativo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnKeyDown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnKeyUp%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseDown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseUp%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseMove%2A> event handlers draw the SplitterRectangle to show the current position of the splitter while it is moving.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnKeyDown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnKeyUp%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseDown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseUp%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseMove%2A>processadores de eventos desenhar SplitterRectangle para mostrar a posição atual do divisor enquanto esta está a mover.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseMove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseUp%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnKeyUp%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnKeyDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: The meaning of the SplitterRectangle values vary depending on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O significado dos valores SplitterRectangle variam consoante o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The output of SplitterRectangle is in the format `{X, Y, Width, Height}`.
trans-unit.target: A saída do SplitterRectangle está no formato `{X, Y, Width, Height}`.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the meaning of the SplitterRectangle values for vertical and horizontal splitters.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra o significado dos valores SplitterRectangle para splitters verticais e horizontais.

trans-unit.source: |Dimension|Vertical Splitter|Horizontal Splitter| |---------------|-----------------------|-------------------------| |X|The distance in pixels of the splitter from the left edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.|This value is always 0 for a horizontal splitter, indicating that the splitter is flush with the left edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.| |Y|This value is always 0 for a vertical splitter, indicating that the splitter is flush with the top edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.|The distance in pixels of the splitter from the top edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.| |Width|The width of the splitter.|The height of the splitter, which is equivalent to the height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> control.| |Height|The height of the splitter, which is equivalent to the height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> control.|The width of the splitter.|
trans-unit.target: | Dimensão | Divisor vertical | Divisor horizontal | |---------------|-----------------------|-------------------------| | X | A distância, em pixels do divisor do limite esquerdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>. | Este valor é sempre 0 para um divisor horizontal, indicando que o divisor é libertação com o limite esquerdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>. | | Y | Este valor é sempre 0 para um divisor vertical, indicando que o divisor é libertação com o limite superior do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>. | A distância, em pixels do divisor do limite superior do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>. | | Largura | A largura do divisor. | A altura do divisor, que é equivalente a altura do controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>. | | A altura | A altura do divisor, que é equivalente a altura do controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>. | A largura do divisor. |</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the size and location of the splitter relative to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que especifica o tamanho e a localização do divisor relativa a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the splitter in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura do divisor em pixéis.

trans-unit.source: Use the SplitterWidth property to change the width of the splitter itself, not the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade SplitterWidth para alterar a largura do divisor autónomo, não o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName> representing the width of the splitter, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName> que representa a largura do divisor, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The default is four pixels.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é de quatro pixéis.

trans-unit.source: The value is less than one or is incompatible with the orientation.
trans-unit.target: O valor é menor que um ou é incompatível com a orientação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to the splitter using the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o utilizador pode dar o foco para o divisor utilizando a tecla de tabulação.

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the TAB key, the input focus is set to the next control in the tab order of the form.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador premir a tecla de tabulação, o foco de entrada é definido para o controlo seguinte na ordem de tabulação do formulário.

trans-unit.source: Set TabStop to `true` to give input focus to a splitter so that it can be moved with the arrow keys as well as with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Definir TabStop `true` para dar o foco de entrada para um divisor para que possa ser movida com as teclas de seta, bem como com o rato.

trans-unit.source: Starting in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], setting TabStop to `false` excludes the splitter and any of the controls that are contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> from the collection of controls in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: A partir de [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], definição TabStop como `false` exclui o divisor e qualquer um dos controlos que estão incluídos no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>da coleção de controlos na ordem de tabulação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>

trans-unit.source: To enable controls to get focus by using the TAB key, create a control that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Para ativar os controlos obter o foco, utilizando a tecla de tabulação, crie um controlo que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>

trans-unit.source: Create a new property named `TabStop` and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.ProcessTabKey%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Criar uma nova propriedade denominada `TabStop` e substituir a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.ProcessTabKey%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.ProcessTabKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to accomplish this.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo seguinte demonstra como efetuar este procedimento.

trans-unit.source: [!code-cs[SplitContainerTabStop#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/splitcontainer/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SplitContainerTabStop#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/splitcontainertabstop/module1.vb#1)] You can manipulate the tab order by setting the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: [!code-cs[SplitContainerTabStop n. º&1;](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/splitcontainer/program.cs#1)][!code-vb[SplitContainerTabStop n. º&1;](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/splitcontainertabstop/module1.vb#1) ] pode manipular a ordem de tabulação ao definir o controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can give the focus to the splitter using the TAB key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o utilizador pode dar o foco para o divisor utilizando a tecla de tabulação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Processa mensagens do Windows.

trans-unit.source: All messages are sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method after getting filtered through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Todas as mensagens são enviadas para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>método após obter filtrada através o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>método corresponde exatamente a do Windows `WindowProc` função.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about processing Windows messages, see the `WindowProc` function in the Platform SDK documentation at http://msdn.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o processamento de mensagens do Windows, consulte o `WindowProc` função na documentação do SDK de plataforma em http://msdn.microsoft.com.
